items.name: Speak in English
items.shortdesc: Mobile application to connect with random people to practice English language
items.desc:
By improving and incorporating novel features into established android applications, a significant increase in user engagement of 22% was realized
Employed third-party APIs to facilitate seamless access to external, in-app cloud data
Oversaw development of proprietary SDK for advertisements and data for organization, resulting in 9.6% increase in overall revenue.
Maintained comprehensive knowledge of mobile development cycle and addressed challenges arising in each phase
